entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSTEST project referring to a MAUI project sometimes fails to build #7806
  • Grid in a ContentView with a ControlTemplate with a ContentPresenter does not size #7805
    6.0-sr2
  • Unable to un-set values on Windows #7803
    6.0-servicing
  • Build crashes on iPadOS immediately when using Location #7801
  • NET7 Include Default Color Styles #7800
    .NET 7
  • ListView not showing and/or throwing exception #7799
  • .NET Maui application throws System.DllNotFoundException for libMicrosoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.core.so #7792
  • doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #7790
  • Publish .NET MAUI Application as Windows Executable #7789
  • Changing the default appicon doesn't work. #7786
  • [MacCatalyst] Button's appearance does not look good after building an application with adopted Mac idiom #7782
  • Shell with content does not appear on iPad with OS 14.4.2 #7781
  • Shell: Tab pages contain ShellContent that does not display settings correctly #7780
  • [Mac] Can I open mac window with fullScreen #7778
  • Cross-platform solution for Right click context menu on desktop app #7777
  • Maui mediapicker on Android Platform opens a blank screen #7776
  • [Editor] Completed command #7775
  • ScrollView and window size #7774

Closed

  • SignalR Client with MessagePack Protocol fails on MAUI iOS. #7753
  • Android Device Tests Crashing #7798
    6.0-sr2
  • Unable to run MAUI app after updating to the latest version #7505

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the new layout system in ContentPresenter #7807
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix SearchBar semantics #7802
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue using DynamicResource TextColor on Label FormattedString #7793
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.0.3 to 1.1.0 #7788
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android,iOS] Fix Selection on CollectionView and VSM color changes for Layouts #7689
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr1
  • [Tizen] Fix RendererToHandlerShim.Tizen #7622
    platform/tizen, 6.0-sr1
  • [housekeeping] Fix signing and insertion for net6 branch #7791
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update ide.host.json schema. #7736
    area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr1
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22301.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22302.1 #7731
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • BlazorWebView WPF tab navigation improvements #7742
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix GridLayoutManager Layout calculation #7712
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix TemplatedView #7771
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue clipping RadioButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Correctly return the value from Focus method #7694
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue using gradients in Button with Corner Radius #7666
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr2
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix issue when the title is an empty string #7638
    area/controls 🎮
  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
